<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Overwhelming Breath](/Feats.aspx?ID=6029) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
<trait label="Spellshape" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=513" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 125 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Qi Spells

</column>

---

You control your breathing and align it with your qi, exhaling with controlled force in order to overcome your opponent's resistance. If you use your next action to Cast a Spell that has the [monk](/Traits.aspx?ID=656) trait and no duration, the spell and any Strikes you make as a result of casting it ignore an amount of the target's resistance to physical damage equal to your level.
name: Overwhelming Breath
